entry.title: [SQ] Freddie deBoer's "More Commenting Sadness" post: > "Comments are off again un
entry.content:
Freddie deBoer's "More Commenting Sadness" post: > "Comments are off again until I decide otherwise. You know why. I have had enough."
I wasn't paying attention and don't know why.
I don't and shouldn't even need to know, but now I want to.
